title: from an Autopsy Report
content:
(the title where it says "the office of...")  
and if the actual font requires purchase, what kind of font is closest to that on a mac?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184735im_/http:/typophile.com/files/essex-county-autopsy-report-light-stress-sml_5757.jpg)

Font: 

 Futura Condensed Bold 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184735/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: bardia

comments.content:
The typeface is Futura Condensed Bold.

Futura comes bundled with the Mac operating system, and two of the weights are Futura Condensed Medium and Futura Condensed Extra Bold.
